N = int(input())

# Use the fact that the product of the first N integers is N!.
# N! = (N-1)! * N, so we can calculate N! by multiplying the previous value by N.
# This method is O(N) in time complexity.
# To avoid overflow, we do all calculations modulo 10^9 + 7.

product = 1
for i in range(1, N + 1):
    product = (product * i) % (10 ** 9 + 7)

print(product)
